data.name: BrainAccelerator
data.detailed_description:
BrainAccelerator is a multiplayer TPS.
Customize your inventory uniquely and strategize with your friends to win.

Take advantage of your "Bullet Time" and strategically pack the enemy!

In BrainAccelerator, when a threat approaches a player, all players on the map go into Bullet Time.
Dodge bullets and blasts, and run around the battlefield as you wish.

Five against five in a heated battle!

You can enter battles on a variety of maps, game modes and player sizes.
3vs3, 5vs5, 1vs5, are supported.
Stats are automatically adjusted based on the number of players, making battles fluid and immersive.

The alpha version is free to play!

For more information about the game's development, plans and announcements, please join our Discord now.
BRAIN ACCELERATOR on Discord!

data.short_description: The TPS game BrainAccelerator offers 5-on-5 bullet-time action.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
